settings.title:

settings.description:

In honor of Black History Month, let's celebrate
and elevate our curls together.

settings.title:
Goodbye Frizz,
Hello Bounce
settings.text:
Our New Soft Curl-Defining Mousse is formulated for all coils, curls, and waves. 
Now available at Walmart.com and select Walmart stores.

settings.title:
This gravity-defying mousse is infused with nourishing
ingredients like chia seed, amino acids, and Hemi15. This
touchable formula not only enhances your natural curl pattern
but also works to repair and strengthen your strands.
settings.subtitle:
Soft Touch,
Lasting Hold

settings.title:

settings.text:

amino acids, and Hemi15. This touchable formula
is not only enhances your natural curl pattern but
also works to repair and strengthen your strands.

settings.title: Our Philosophy
settings.text: At 4U, we believe hair care should be <br class="hide-mobile">simple, safe, sustainable, and science-backed. <br class="hide-mobile">Our products are good for you <br class="hide-mobile">and the planet and are clinically proven<br class="hide-mobile"> to deliver results for all curl types.
